returns.challengeWindow: Number of epochs for the challenge window
returns.challengesPerProof: Number of challenges required per proof
returns.initChallengeWindowStart: Initial challenge window start for new data sets assuming proving period starts now
returns.maxProvingPeriod: Maximum number of epochs between proofs

params.setId: The ID of the data set

returns._0: The block number when the next challenge window starts

nextPDPChallengeWindowStart(uint256).notice: Returns the start of the next challenge window for a data set
